[丯]
Pictogram of something carved/engraved. Proto-form of 㓞 . Unrelated to 丰 .
The character was also used as a variant of 王 , later written as 玉 .

[丰] simplified and variant traditional form of 豐.

[豐]
Ideogram ( 指事 ) – The top component is 𠁳 , a pot full of plants 丰 (abundance, plenty). The bottom component is 豆 , which is another pot.
Unrelated to 豊 , in which two strings of jade pieces 玨 are present. The top component of 豐 is unrelated to 山 .

[豊] an ancient form of 禮.

[禮]
Phono-semantic compound ( 形聲 / 形声 , OC *riːʔ ) and ideogrammic compound ( 會意 / 会意 ): semantic 礻 ( “ altar ” ) + phonetic 豊 ( OC *riːʔ , “ ceremony ” ) – performing rites at the altar.
Originally written 豊 , see there for more.

[礼] simplified and ancient form of 禮.
